title: Fifteen Month Golf Course Membership for £39 with Open Fairways (£112 Value)
highlights:
• Exclusive green fee offers at over 1,000 premier courses throughout the UK and Ireland 
  • Includes over 600 international venues in Spain, France, Portugal and beyond 
  • Discounts apply to members and up to 7 guests 
  • Fully transferable membership card valid for 15 months 
  • Half Price offers at a wide selection of hotels

title: Two Grandstand and Paddock Enclosure Tickets With a Drink Each for £13 at the Catterick Races (£34 Value)
highlights:
• Up-close to the action
  • Includes a wine, beer, lager, or soft drink each
  • Popular and venerable racetrack
  • Former haunt of Collier Hill
  • Under 16s go free

title: Cumbrian Getaway For Two Including Breakfast and Tapasfor One Night (£69) or Two Nights (£129) at The Hallmark Hotel Carlisle (Save up to 62%)
highlights:
• Set in the scenic Lake District
  • Free parking
  • Room upgrades available for discounted rate of £10 per night
  • Includes bottle of wine when dining in the brasserie
  • Free Parking (limited)
  • £18.50 pp for a 3 course meal for Groupon guests
